title: Is 'Dune Messiah (Dune Chronicles #2)' by Frank Herbert worth the read? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. I loved that book. I could not predict the turn it would take nor how the sequel Children of Dune would warp. But it is well worth the read, no where near as philosophical as the first but no where near as good vs bad…good triumphs. If you like twists you will like this book.
